channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Unelected Magistrate Judges Undermining Trump And Rule Of Law Are Completely Unconstitutional
item.description: Contrary to widespread perception, magistrate judges wield extraordinary power despite having no constitutional standing under Article III.

item.title: Pro-Life, Pro-Abortion Forces Fan Out Over Virginia Ahead Of Election Season
item.description: The stakes are high. Every Virginia House seat is up for re-election and Democrats are doubling down on expanding abortion until birth.

item.title: Pro-Lifers Aren’t the Crazed Haters Depicted by the Media
item.description: When the anger scatters, there’s real human concern and compassion.

item.title: Supreme Court Ruling Is A Greenlight For Parents Who Want To Take Back Public Education
item.description: Whether through Supreme Court precedent, statutes, or even constitutional amendments, ours is a parental rights moment that demands action to allow pa...

item.title: Trump Admin Should Purge IRS Of Officials Who Targeted Conservatives
item.description: If the administration wants to show they are serious about lasting reform and an end to lawfare operations, they should empower Long to drain the left...

item.title: Trump administration's crackdown on pro-Palestinian campus activists faces federal trial
item.description: A federal bench trial begins Monday over a lawsuit that challenges a Trump administration campaign of arresting and deporting faculty and students who...

item.title: Democrats turn to 'abundance movement' that adds deregulation to the liberal agenda
item.description: Democrats seeking a way to bounce back from their dismal losses in November are embracing the abundance movement, which promises to rein in Gig Govern...

item.title: Louisiana’s Declaration of Energy Independence
item.description: The new state law shifting focus to producing domestic fuel, not energy that relies on foreign countries, provides a model for other states to follow.

item.title: San Francisco Store’s Ban On J.K. Rowling Shows The Left’s ‘Book Ban’ Complaints Are Pure Manipulation
item.description: The magic found in the pages of Rowling’s books can no longer be found at this store, but the liberal propaganda is hard to miss.

item.title: An Epidemic of Media Doublespeak
item.description: And nowhere is the problem more severe than in the coverage of trans athletes.

item.title: Pressure from Trump for trade deals before Wednesday deadline, but hints of more time for talks

item.title: The Legacy of Alasdair MacIntyre
item.description: What to make of the work and influence of the legendary philosopher and academic in the wake of his death at 96.

item.title: When We Forget Our History, We Risk Our Future
item.description: In our highly partisan political moment, civics education is perhaps more important than ever.

item.title: Kentucky's Gov. Beshear says Trump's 'big beautiful bill' will 'hit rural America right in the face'
item.description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear said President Trump and the Republican-controlled Congress are waging war on rural America.
